Actions.Name: Crow Storm
Actions.Description: The hob chooses a foe in range 4. At the end of that foe's next turn, a huge storm of crows descends on their location for a blast 1 area effect centered on them. That foe takes [fray] damage six times. Reduce this damage once for each other character in the area of effect.

Actions.Name: Bounding Leaps
Actions.Effects: If it lands on an object or adjacent to a character, it can repeat this flight once more.
